docs.snippet: The convention on genocide -- the new name for the old crime of destroying groups of human beings -- has the not unexpected distinction of being the most ratified document sponsored by the United Nations. Last week Lebanon and Uruguay announced that...
docs.lead_paragraph: The convention on genocide -- the new name for the old crime of destroying groups of human beings -- has the not unexpected distinction of being the most ratified document sponsored by the United Nations. Last week Lebanon and Uruguay announced that their Governments will soon deposit their ratifications with the U. N., bringing the total number of countries so supporting this treaty to forty-three.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 20 -- A United Nations committee voted today to continue the office of the High Commissioner for Refugees for five years from Jan. 1, 1954, with Dr. G. J. van Heuven Goedhart as high commissioner.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Oct. 20 -- A United Nations committee voted today to continue the office of the High Commissioner for Refugees for five years from Jan. 1, 1954, with Dr. G. J. van Heuven Goedhart as high commissioner.
docs.abstract: approves extending Office 5 yrs with van Heuven Goedhart as High Comr; backs plea to world to help him solve refugee problems; he denies USSR charges that he is controlled by US, West and Ford Foundation or that Assembly orders him to weigh repatriation as sole basis for handling refugees

headline.main: U. N. UNIT SUPPORTS REFUGEE PROGRAM; Assembly Committee Votes to Keep High Commissioner in Post Five Years More

docs.snippet: THE cruise schedule being offered winter vacationists probably will be the biggest in number of ships available since pre-war days, and judging from the way the customers are booking space in advance, it probably will also be one of the best in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE cruise schedule being offered winter vacationists probably will be the biggest in number of ships available since pre-war days, and judging from the way the customers are booking space in advance, it probably will also be one of the best in the history of present-day cruise operators.

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 5 -- By a margin of only four votes, a United Nations committee officially endorsed today the status of Puerto Rico as a self-governing commonwealth.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., Nov. 5 -- By a margin of only four votes, a United Nations committee officially endorsed today the status of Puerto Rico as a self-governing commonwealth.
docs.abstract: Trusteeship Com, 22-18, agrees; authorizes US to cease transmitting data, 24-17; Bolton comment
